name: Arijit Singh | MTV India Tour
description: Arijit Singh is an Indian singer and music composer. He sings predominantly in Hindi and Bengali, and is known for his melodious voice and powerful vocals.

name: Sunidhi Chauhan Live in Concert
description: Experience the powerhouse performer Sunidhi Chauhan live as she brings her energetic vocals and chart-topping hits to the stage.

name: Sonu Nigam's Musical Night
description: Join the versatile singer Sonu Nigam for an enchanting evening filled with soulful melodies and timeless classics.

name: Shreya Ghoshal | Melodious Evening
description: Witness the mesmerizing voice of Shreya Ghoshal as she performs her greatest hits in an intimate concert setting.

name: Kumar Sanu Retro Night
description: Relive the golden era of 90s Bollywood music with the legendary Kumar Sanu performing his iconic songs.

name: Alka Yagnik Live Concert
description: Join the melodious Alka Yagnik for an evening of romantic ballads and memorable Bollywood hits.

name: KK's Rock Symphony
description: Experience the magic of KK's versatile voice as he performs his rock anthems and soulful numbers.

name: Mohit Chauhan Unplugged
description: An acoustic evening with Mohit Chauhan featuring his popular songs in intimate, stripped-down arrangements.

name: Neha Kakkar's Pop Extravaganza
description: Join the sensation Neha Kakkar for a high-energy performance of her latest hits and party anthems.

name: Udit Narayan Classical Night
description: A classical evening with the legendary Udit Narayan, featuring his timeless Bollywood classics.
